wikipedia_page.main: Martin McNiff (born 23 August 1991) is a Scottish footballer who plays for Stirling Albion as a defender. McNiff has previously played for Dumbarton, Annan Athletic and Clyde.McNiff became the first Clyde defender to score ten goals in one season since 1934–35 in April 2019 and the first defender to register ten goals from open play. The team won promotion to League One in 2018–19. At the PFA Scotland awards, he was named in Team of the Year for League Two
